name: Xenosartorial - A Parhelion Fashion Zine
description:
14 stylish fashion portraits, in a range of styles- sporty, casual, clerical, formal, ribald. (All free!)

Strange Paths features six portraits from alternate timelines...

-Pirate Prince Peter

-Yima Salaryman Cerril

-Ambassador Sawtooth

-Inkling the Specter

-Basilisk the Paladin

-Nikolai the Tyrant
